Name: Londoner (Wood's recipe)
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Rich blackberry fruit liqueur balanced by pink grapefruit and lime juice, with gin fortifying and adding complexity. The flavour is reminiscent of a Bramble served straight-up.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Joe Wood, Cocktail Stars, England and brought to our attention by Gary "gaz" Regan .
Nutrition: One serving of Londoner (Wood's recipe) contains 197 calories
